toughbook.title: TOUGHBOOK rugged mobile computing
toughbook.intro: TOUGHBOOK has everything covered when you’re looking for your next device. With a range of laptops and notebooks built for long days and heavy-duty use, plus a full suite of accessories to fit every need, TOUGHBOOK is education’s supreme answer to mobile computing.

content.name: Product
content.title: TOUGHBOOK devices
content.intro: For the heavy traffic, all-day use that education demands, there’s no better solution than the TOUGHBOOK range of laptops and notebooks.
list: Lightweight yet robust hardware that stands the test of time, along with knocks, drops and spills
Extended battery life – up to 20 hours – plus warm and hot-swap battery options
Superior screen readability in all conditions – perfect for darkened rooms or in bright lights

content.name: Case study
content.title: See TOUGHBOOK in action
content.intro: Don’t just take our word for it. We have hundreds of case studies demonstrating just how far our TOUGHBOOK range of notebooks, tablets and handheld devices can take you.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Engineered by specialists, for specialists
content.intro:
TOUGHBOOK notebook PCs and tablets are no ordinary devices. Our engineers and production professionals design and build every part of every model, so each form, feature and function is created specifically for purpose.

And how do we know what’s needed? Our ethos of listening to the ‘voice of the customer’.

projector.title: Panasonic Fixed Installation Projectors
projector.intro: We’re leading the way in projectors for fixed installation. From DLP projectors to LCD projectors, we’ll help you to deliver big, bright, colourful images that are guaranteed to free imaginations and capture attention.

content.name: Product
content.title: Fixed-Installation Projectors
content.intro: Our projectors may be fixed, but they’re built for total flexibility.
list: A wide range of lenses, ceiling projector mounts and brackets give you more freedom to locate both your projector for an optimised display
Short throw and long throw projectors available, suitable for seminar rooms and lecture spaces of any size
Powerful edge blending and colour matching features allow adjacent fixed-installation projectors to work together seamlessly
Supports wireless transmission, for simpler collaboration

content.name: Case study
content.title: Laser-sharp learning with Panasonic laser projection
content.intro: Tilburg University specialises in scientific education, and are strengthening their leading position with an enriched learning experience. But how can they enable cost-efficient projection which supports more effective and efficient learning?</br></br>Enter Panasonic.  With our laser projectors installed throughout the university, we were able to support high-quality projection to increase the learning efficiency while reducing the university’s costs.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Superior colour and reliability
content.intro: What are the benefits of Panasonic’s RGB LED projection technology? And why might it be the superior solution for your higher education projection requirements? Discover all you need to know about the technology’s capabilities, including:
list: Deep saturation, deep colour reproduction and wide colour-space reproduction
LED switching eliminates need for a colour-wheel, for high reliability and picture quality
Hermetically sealed DMD block protects against dust intrusion
Higher brightness and colour retention until the next refresh cycle
Over 20,000 hours of maintenance-free projection

screen.title: INTERACTIVE MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
screen.intro: When it comes to collaboration, Panasonic’s multi-touch professional displays have been designed for free, flexible and intuitive working. With robust touchscreens that are built for the all-day, always-on education environments, they’re able to handle heavy use without compromising on quality.

content.name: Product
content.title: Multi-touch Professional LED Displays
content.intro: Our multi-touch professional LED displays bring smarter, faster solutions to tutors and students who want to interact with their visual technology.
list: Featuring accessible and intuitive whiteboard technology
Available with a choice of touchscreen sizes ranging from 42” to 80”
Ideal for collaborative learning and the Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) trend
Bring practical functions to collaboration and learning, such as PowerPoint presentation mode, video and screen capture and desktop mode

content.name: Case study
content.title: A new collaborative future
content.intro: As student expectations change, the ability to deliver a more active, personalised learning experience is going to be an important part of future lesson delivery.</br></br>So, when Lancaster University opened their newest teaching suite, administrators used the opportunity to rethink the way their classrooms were set up and explore how they could incorporate more technology into the learning experience with Panasonic multi-touch displays.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Multi-touch display: Which technology is right for you?
content.intro: To ensure we are covering all your institutions’ needs, Panasonic delivers different technologies embedded in our professional multi-touch screen displays.</br></br>Our interactive screens with whiteboard functionality can be used for collaboration and Bring your own device (BYOD) environments from classrooms, to seminar rooms, to lecture theatres and presentation rooms.</br></br>Our guide will help you find the right product.

pressIt.title: PressIT Wireless Presentation System
pressIt.intro: Introducing Panasonic’s Wireless Presentation System: PressIT. Enjoy easy collaboration with the single click of a button with our elegant solution, designed to make collaboration quick and simple.

content.name: Product
content.title: PressIT Wireless Presentation System
content.intro: Eliminate troublesome setups and cluttered cables. Simply connect your receiver, connect your device and PressIT.
list: Connect up to 32 devices at one time
BYOD enabled: PressIT is software agnostic and can support video and audio from PCs, Android, iOS and other mobile devices
Display up to 4 simultaneous display sources at one time
Two receiver types available – set top box and SDM board

content.name: Case study
content.title: See for yourself
